message.entry: 需要 Signal Processing Toolbox 许可证。
所有成员使用相同颜色
从信号标注器导出的数据集
数据集中的每个成员都有一个对应的 MAT 文件，其中包含以下变量:
包含成员的每个标签实例的表
成员的标签实例向量在空间坐标中定义为一个 M×4 数值矩阵，其行的形式为 [x y w h]，其中 M 是标签实例的数量，x 和 y 指定矩形的左上角，w 指定矩形沿 x 轴的宽度，h 指定矩形沿 y 轴的高度。
与信号时频图的前两个维度大小相同的数组，其中数组中的每个值表示信号时频图中那些相同索引的值。
组成成员的一个或多个信号
用于生成时频图的时频选项
This is a template for creating a custom function for automated labeling\n%

x is a matrix where each column contains data corresponding to a
% channel. If the channels have different lengths, then x is a cell array
% of column vectors.
%
% t is a matrix where each column contains time corresponding to a
% channel. If the channels have different lengths, then t is a cell array
% of column vectors.
%
% parentLabelVal is the parent label value associated with the output
% sublabel or empty when output is not a sublabel.
% parentLabelLoc contains an empty vector when the parent label is an
% attribute, a vector of ROI limits when parent label is an ROI or a point
% location when parent label is a point.
%
% labelVals must be a column vector with numeric, logical or string output
% values.
% labelLocs must be an empty vector when output labels are attributes, a
% two column matrix of ROI limits when output labels are ROIs, or a column
% vector of point locations when output labels are points.

x is a column vector of the input signal in time.
%
% tf is the spectrogram power estimate matrix where each column contains
% data corresponding to the power estimate of a windowed time segment and
% each row contains data corresponding to a power estimate of a frequency
% bin.
%
% t is a column vector of the centers of each windowed time segment for
% the spectrogram power estimate.
%
% f is a column vector of the centers of each frequency bin for the
% spectrogram power estimate.
%
% tfOptions is an object that contains information about how the power
% estimate was calculated.
%
% labelVals must be a column vector with numeric, logical or string output
% values.
% labelLocsTime must be a two column matrix of ROI limits.
% labelLocsFreq must be a two column matrix of ROI limits.
